formalpara.title: Figure 7.
formalpara.para: MSap descendants provide an inductive focus of Notch signaling on the left side of the embryo. Schematic diagram of a cross section through an embryo at successive time points. MS descendants are indicated with a bold black outline with the left, ligand-expressing cells shown in blue. LIN-12-expressing cells are outlined in red, and cells that undergo Notch signaling are filled with green. As gastrulation movements cause AB descendants to flow toward the ventral midline (arrows outside embryo), they come into contact with the ligand-expressing cell.
